content.text: Match ends, Juventus 2, Galatasaray 2.
Second Half ends, Juventus 2, Galatasaray 2.

Attempt blocked. Arturo Vidal (Juventus) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

Goal!  Juventus 2, Galatasaray 2. Umut Bulut (Galatasaray) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Didier Drogba with a headed pass.

Goal!  Juventus 2, Galatasaray 1. Fabio Quagliarella (Juventus) header from the centre of the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Andrea Pirlo with a cross following a set piece situation.
